rr.simple
Class MethodMonitoringTool

java.lang.Object
  rr.tool.Tool
      rr.simple.MethodMonitoringTool

public abstract class MethodMonitoringTool
extends Tool

Super class that adds a decoration to each method indicating whether or not it is "interesting". Subclass this to get an efficient way to decide which methods to process at run time.
